subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update Attachments; TEXT.htm AW Skipper-Scott,  saw him before his Legal visit. He seems stable and is now at his Legal visit. He also complained about having to go back up to SHU. Being anxious about it and not being able to sleep there because of the noise of inmates banging and screaming at night. >>> Shirley V.
